 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.mixare

Class Summary
ARData Abstract class which should be used to set global data.
AugmentedReality This class extends the SensorsActivity and is designed tie the AugmentedView and zoom bar together.
AugmentedView This class extends the View class and is designed draw the zoom bar, radar circle, and markers on the View.
CameraCompatibility Ensures compatibility with older and newer versions of the API.
CameraModel Represents the camera and it's view.
CameraSurface Represents the camera's surface and all the initialization involved with it.
DataSource This abstract class should be extended for new data sources.
GooglePlacesDataSource This class extends DataSource to fetch data from Google Places.
IconMarker This class extends Marker and draws an icon instead of a circle for it's visual representation.
LocalDataSource This class should be used as a example local data source.
LowPassFilter This class implements a low-pass filter.
Marker This class will represent a physical location and will calculate it's visibility and draw it's text and visual representation accordingly.
Matrix A Matrix representation which adds many of the mathematical operations involved in Matrices.
NetworkDataSource This abstract class should be extended for new data sources.
PaintableBox This class extends PaintableObject to draw an outlined box.
PaintableBoxedText This class extends PaintableObject to draw text with a box surrounding it.
PaintableCircle This class extends PaintableObject to draw a circle with a given radius.
PaintableGps This class extends PaintableObject to draw a circle with a given radius and a stroke width.
PaintableIcon This class extends PaintableObject to draw an icon.
PaintableLine This class extends PaintableObject to draw a line.
PaintableObject This abstract class provides many methods paint objects on a given Canvas.
PaintablePoint This class extends PaintableObject and draws a small rectangle.
PaintablePosition This class extends PaintableObject and adds the ability to rotate and scale.
PaintableRadarPoints This class extends PaintableObject to draw all the Markers at their appropriate locations.
PaintableText This class extends PaintableObject to draw text.
PhysicalLocation This class is used to represent a physical locations which have a latitude, longitude, and alitude.
PitchAzimuthCalculator A state class used to calculate bearing and pitch given a Matrix.
Radar This class will visually represent a radar screen with a radar radius and blips on the screen in their appropriate locations.
ScreenPosition This class is used mostly as a utility to calculate relative positions.
SensorsActivity This class extends Activity and processes sensor data and location data.
Utilities A general utilities class.
Vector A Vector representation which adds many of the mathematical operations involved in Vectors.
WikipediaDataSource This class extends DataSource to fetch data from Wikipedia.
